title: Matt Ryan's contract, Cowboys draft/win total breakdown (Football 05/04)
description:
Matt Ryan just got a ridiculous new contract and Will Brinson explains why it's a smart deal for the Falcons (also for Matt Ryan). Then Will is joined by Patrik Walker (@VoiceOfTheStar) of 247 Sports to break down what the boys in Big D did during the draft, if the Cowboys have sufficient weapons for Dak Prescott in his third season, if they're better off without Dez Bryant and Jason Witten, whether or not the defense can be a top tier unit, what to expect from Rico Gathers this season and much much more.
